results.title: Effect of combination treatment of S-amlodipine with peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor agonists on metabolic and cardiovascular parameters in Zucker fa/fa rats
results.text_hl: ...In combination, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@S-Amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@Pioglitazone@@@ significantly reduced @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ (115.1 +- 6.6 vs. 81.7 +- 4.2), BP (184.4 +- 5.0 vs. 155.1 +- 5.0), serum @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@ (362.5 +- 47.5 vs. 211.1 +- 23.7) and @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@glucose intolerance@@@ when compared with vehicle treated Zucker fa/fa @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

PMID: 24673913

results.title: Comparison between valsartan and amlodipine regarding cardiovascular morbidity and mortality in hypertensive patients with glucose intolerance: NAGOYA HEART Study.

results.title: Combined Treatment with Amlodipine and Atorvastatin Calcium Reduces Circulating Levels of Intercellular Adhesion Molecule-1 and Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha in Hypertensive Patients with Prediabetes
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@Prediabetes@@@ was diagnosed according to 2010 ADA criteria including @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@impaired fasting glucose@@@ (@DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@IFG@@@) or/and @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@IGT@@@; American @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ Association,) tests.

results.title: Angiotension converting enzyme inhibition and calcium channel blockage improves cyclosporine induced glucose intolerance in rats.
results.text_hl: In summary, @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@CsA@@@ treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ show @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@, which is improved by @CHEMICAL_Quinapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077583 @@@quinapril@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Yavuz DG, Tuğlular S, Koçak H, Atakan A, Ozener C, Akoğlu E, Akalin S. Angiotension converting enzyme inhibition and calcium channel blockage improves cyclosporine induced glucose intolerance in rats. Transplant Proc. 2004 Jan-Feb;36(1):171-4. PMID: 15013337

results.title: [Investigation into vegetative regulation of blood circulation during 7-day dry immersion].
results.text_hl: Presumably, it was the cause of @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@poor orthostatic tolerance@@@ of several test-subjects.
